[Message from Captain Lucas]:

Congratulations on achieving level 28!
I am Captain Lucas of Dion Castle Town.
I've heard a lot about your activities. It is said that you are a very skilled and accomplished adventurer, which is why I'm sending you this message. It is time you knew about Kamaloka and its mutated monsters, Kaneuses. If fear has no hold on you, come to me immediately. I will await your arrival.
